projects.name: Zack Snyder's Justice League (English, 2021)
projects.summary: Determined to ensure Superman's ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne aligns forces with Diana Prince with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

projects.name: Drishyam 2 (Malayalam, 2021)
projects.summary: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

projects.name: The Wailing (English, 2021)
projects.summary: Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.

projects.name: Mortal Kombat Legends: Scorpion's Revenge (English, 2020)
projects.summary: Hanzo Hasashi loses his clan, family, and his life during an attack by a rival ninja clan. He is given the chance to compete in an interdimensional tournament to save his loved ones.

projects.name: WandaVision (English, 2021)
projects.summary: Blends the style of classic sitcoms with the MCU in which Wanda Maximoff and Vision -two super-powered beings living their ideal suburban lives-begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

projects.name: The Dig (English, 2021)
projects.summary: On the eve of World War II, a British widow hires a self-taught archaeologist to dig up mysterious formations on her land, leading to a staggering find.

projects.name: Wrong Turn (English, 2021)
projects.summary: Friends hiking the Appalachian Trail are confronted by 'The Foundation', a community of people who have lived in the mountains for hundreds of years.
